tool_description: Capture, curate and manage asynchronous videos/playbacks.
name: Ziggeo
title: Ziggeo

api_list.name: createAuthtoken

optional_parameters.name: volatile
optional_parameters.description: Will this object automatically be deleted if it remains empty?

optional_parameters.name: expirationDate
optional_parameters.description: Expiration date for the auth token

optional_parameters.name: usageExperitationTime
optional_parameters.description: For how many seconds do you want the session to exist for?

optional_parameters.name: hidden
optional_parameters.description: If hidden, the token cannot be used directly.

api_list.name: createStream
createVideo

optional_parameters.name: volatile
optional_parameters.description: Automatically removed this video if it remains empty

api_list.name: deleteAuthtoken
deleteStream
deleteVideo
api_list.description: Delete video by ID or Key

api_list.name: downloadSingleVideo
api_list.description: Get link to download video file

api_list.name: downloadStreamThumbnail
api_list.description: Get link to download stream thumbnail file

api_list.name: downloadStreamVideo
api_list.description: Get link to download stream video file

api_list.name: downloadVideoThumbnail
api_list.description: Get link to download video thumbnail file

api_list.name: getAuthtoken
getSingleStream
getSingleVideo
api_list.description: Get a single video by token or key.

api_list.name: getStreams
getVideos
api_list.description: The videos resource allows you to access all single videos. Each video may contain more than one stream.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: Limit the number of returned videos. Can be set up to 100.

optional_parameters.name: reverse
optional_parameters.description: Reverse the order in which videos are returned.

optional_parameters.name: tags
optional_parameters.description: Filter the search result to certain tags, encoded as a comma-separated string

api_list.name: pushStreamToPushService
api_list.description: Push stream to service (DropBox, Google drive, ftp etc).

required_parameters.name: serviceToken
required_parameters.description: Push service token. You can find it in Manage option of you application at Ziggeo.com after creation Integration and Push Service.

api_list.name: pushVideoToPushService
api_list.description: Push video and streams (depends on settings) to service (DropBox, Google drive, ftp etc).

required_parameters.name: serviceToken
required_parameters.description: Push service token. You can find it in Manage option of you application at Ziggeo.com after creation Integration and Push Service.

api_list.name: updateAuthtoken

optional_parameters.name: volatile
optional_parameters.description: Will this object automatically be deleted if it remains empty?

optional_parameters.name: expirationDate
optional_parameters.description: Expiration date for the auth token

optional_parameters.name: usageExperitationTime
optional_parameters.description: For how many seconds do you want the session to exist for?

optional_parameters.name: hidden
optional_parameters.description: If hidden, the token cannot be used directly.

api_list.name: updateVideo
api_list.description: Update video by ID or Key

optional_parameters.name: volatile
optional_parameters.description: Automatically removed this video if it remains empty

optional_parameters.name: expirationDays
optional_parameters.description: After how many days will this video be deleted
